title: RV Space with full Hookups available aug 1!
posting_body: I have an airstream/RV space avail starting August 1st.
This is a BYO RV Situation
What's included:
-water
-trash
-sewage
-large, semi-private yard
-off-street parking space
-surveillance system
-laidback management
-complete privacy fence
-pest services (you may utilize these within your RV as well)
-Wooden deck (pictured here)
The space is located in Georgian Acres neighborhood.
Lots of trees and privacy -- a unique little gem for anyone who lives the mobile lifestyle.
15 mins to the airport, 5 mins to anderson lane eateries and shops, 10 mins to the domain, 12 mins to downtown.
I'm looking for someone who will stay for 3 months minimum lease
but I will rent for longer or shorter periods as well.
The cost is $800 per month with a one-month security deposit.
If you'd like to rent month to month, the cost will be different (a 30 day minimum is required).
A background check and proof of income are required.
Text is the best way to reach me.
Responding to the ad directly might result in delays.
electricity, landscaping, and internet are charged monthly (estimated around $30-80 per month or DIY!)
Dogs and other pets will be considered but for transparency's sake we already have 2 other dogs living on the property and if you do have a dog we will need to be sure everyone meshes.
If you do have a dog there will be a small monthly pet fee + deposit required.
The airstream pictured here is a 27 foot but it has a lot of room to be pushed back.
I'd say the max length is somewhere around 30-35 feet.
